name: Man In Red
description:
------------------------------------- To be played in Fullscreen ------------------------------------

Explore our first 2D side-scroller demo.  Death is a big part! Each time you die you respawn a certain distance behind. With each death the distance gets bigger. If you find your bodies you'll be able to pick up power-ups that give you buffs and de-buffs. Some power-ups are also scattered throughout the world. You'll explore three different levels with different styles and gameplay. Explore them all and beat the final surprise of level 3 to become the ultimate Man In Red! 

Developed by four students at FC - University of Lisbon for the course of Game Design and Development. It was our very first game, so any feedback will be highly appreciated :)

Developed by:
